name: Unityescape (VR version with Android)
description:
This game is made with . . . you guessed it, Unity! 😱Our Unity-chan has been kidnapped!😱 About

Unityescape is an escape-themed game for PC and VR (Android). The story starts when Unity-chan suddenly wakes up in a weird place underground. Find your way up and out of the situation.

Help Unity-chan to escape, play along as Unity-chan, interact with various things and watch the story unfolds!

*Recommended to use headphones / earphone to play*

Some features uses Spatial Audio, so you will get the full experience by using a headphone / earphone.

Controls

PC

  • WASD = Walk
  • WASD + LeftShift = Run
  • leftCtrl = Crouch
  • Space = Jump
  • RightClickMouse (Hold) = Aim
  • LeftClickMouse = Shoot (Only if you hold Aim + If you have certain items in inventory)
  • E = Interact

Android (VR Box Controller)

  • Joystick = Walk
  • B (Hold) = Run
  • trigger2 = Crouch
  • D = Jump
  • trigger1 (Hold) = Aim
  • trigger1 (Hold) + C = Shoot (Only if you hold Aim + If you have certain items in inventory)
  • A = Interact
  • trigger2 + trigger1 + B = Open menu (Make sure the order of button pressed is right, trigger2 -> trigger1 -> B)

I hope you enjoy our game, and don't forget to fill your Unity-chanium for today
